name: Flight Radar
description: The world's most popular flight tracker API which helps you to create Flight tracker application, such as : flightradar24.com

api_methods.name: flights/list-in-boundary
api_methods.description: Helps to list flights, aircrafts in a GEO bounding box, and display them on a map

parameters.name: bl_lng
parameters.description: The bottom left longitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: tr_lat
parameters.description: The top right latitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: bl_lat
parameters.description: The bottom left latitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: tr_lng
parameters.description: The top right longitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The value of 'Code' field returned in .../aircrafts/list endpoint

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: Filter by speed. The format is min,max . Ex : 0,460

parameters.name: airline
parameters.description: The value of 'ICAO' field returned in .../airlines/list endpoint

parameters.name: altitude
parameters.description: Filter by altitude. The format is min,max . Ex : 0,48000

parameters.name: airport
parameters.description: The value of 'icao' field returned in .../airports/list endpoint

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of flights per response (max 300)

utterances.utterance: Show me all flights within the bounding box with bottom left coordinates at longitude 100.5 and latitude 13.6, and top right coordinates at longitude 100.9 and latitude 13.8.
List flights in the area defined by bottom left longitude 100.6, latitude 13.7 and top right longitude 100.8, latitude 13.9.
Find aircrafts flying in the region with bottom left corner at longitude 100.4, latitude 13.5 and top right corner at longitude 100.7, latitude 13.9.
Can you show flights in the bounding box from longitude 100.3, latitude 13.4 to longitude 100.9, latitude 13.8?
Display flights within the area with bottom left longitude 100.2, latitude 13.3 and top right longitude 100.6, latitude 13.7.
I need a list of flights in the region from bottom left longitude 100.1, latitude 13.2 to top right longitude 100.5, latitude 13.6.
Provide flights in the bounding box with bottom left at longitude 100.7, latitude 13.5 and top right at longitude 100.9, latitude 13.9.
Show aircrafts in the area defined by bottom left longitude 100.8, latitude 13.6 and top right longitude 101.0, latitude 14.0.
List all flights in the bounding box from longitude 100.0, latitude 13.0 to longitude 100.4, latitude 13.4.
Find flights within the region with bottom left corner at longitude 100.9, latitude 13.8 and top right corner at longitude 101.1, latitude 14.2.
